revised_title: Phylogenetic Relationships of Sea Urchins (Echinoidea: Echinodermata)
tldr: This study investigates the phylogenetic relationships of sea urchins (Echinoidea: Echinodermata) using a combination of morphological and molecular data. The researchers compiled a 163-character morphological database and molecular sequences from large and small subunit ribosomal RNA genes. Their findings provide insights into the relationships of higher taxa within the echinoid group, contributing to a better understanding of their evolutionary history.
